overview.title: What You'll Learn
overview.description: This tutorial will teach you how to set up and use the notification system in Plugged.in, allowing your AI assistant to send real-time alerts and updates.
overview.learn1: How to enable notifications in your profile
overview.learn3: Setting up email notifications for critical alerts
overview.learn4: Best practices for notification severity levels

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.item1: Plugged.in account with MCP proxy configured
prerequisites.item2: MCP client (Claude Desktop, Cursor, etc.) connected
prerequisites.item3: Email configured in settings (optional, for email notifications)

step1.title: Enable Notifications
step1.description: First, ensure notifications are enabled for your current profile. This allows the MCP proxy to log activities and send notifications.
step1.screenshot: Screenshot: Profile settings with notifications toggle
step1.screenshotDesc: Shows the notification settings in your profile
step1.note: Notifications are enabled by default for new profiles. You can check the bell icon in the navigation to see your notification count.

step2.title: Configure Email Notifications (Optional)
step2.description: For critical alerts, you can enable email delivery. This ensures you receive important notifications even when not actively using Plugged.in.

emailSetup.title: Email Setup Steps
emailSetup.step3: Verify your email address if not already done
